title: Update UI color scheme to greenish-blue teal with professional spacing

requirements.text: Change the primary UI color scheme from light blue to a greenish-blue teal color (similar to the reference link previously provided), updating all color variables in the Tailwind configuration and CSS files to use the new color palette throughout the application

quotes: change the colour of the ui from blue light to greenish blue type you understand like the one in the earlier link

acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI colors are changed to greenish-blue teal across all components
Color changes are applied consistently in both light and dark themes
All interactive elements (buttons, links, focus states) use the new color palette
The color scheme maintains proper contrast ratios for accessibility

requirements.text: Update the card component borders to use the new greenish-blue teal color with a flashy/prominent appearance, ensuring the border styling is applied to all card elements including role selector cards, dashboard cards, and portal interface cards

quotes: flashy cards border should also be from the same color

acceptanceCriteria: All card borders use the greenish-blue teal color
Border styling is prominent and visually appealing
Border styling is consistent across all card components (RoleSelector, dashboard cards, portal cards)
The flashy appearance is achieved through appropriate border width, opacity, or glow effects

requirements.text: Refine the UI spacing and layout throughout the application to create a professional, minimalistic, and attractive appearance with proper padding, margins, and whitespace between elements

quotes: taking proper spaces making it look very attractive
make it professional and minimalistic and very good

acceptanceCriteria: All components have consistent and appropriate spacing (padding and margins)
Whitespace is used effectively to create visual hierarchy and breathing room
Layout feels clean, professional, and minimalistic
Spacing follows a consistent scale throughout the application
The overall visual appearance is attractive and polished

requirements.text: Verify that all existing functionality (authentication, portal navigation, emergency SOS, symptom checker, medical report analysis, admin/doctor dashboards, case management, and doctor management) continues to work correctly after the UI color and spacing changes

quotes: please ensure that everything works properly

acceptanceCriteria: All authentication flows work without errors
Portal navigation and role-based access control functions correctly
Emergency SOS form submission works properly
Symptom checker and medical report analysis features are functional
Admin and doctor dashboards display data correctly
Case management and doctor assignment features work as expected
No regression issues introduced by color or spacing changes

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo unless absolutely necessary
Preserve all existing functionality while updating colors and spacing
Maintain accessibility standards (contrast ratios) with the new color scheme
Keep the Flipkart-inspired minimalistic design aesthetic
Do not change frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui components
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond color and spacing updates
Changing the overall layout structure or component hierarchy
Modifying backend logic or data models
Creating new portal sections or dashboards
